title: By the Lords Justices, a proclamation for publishing the peace between His Majesty and the French king
author: England and Wales. Lords Justices.
publisher: Printed by Charles Bill, and the executrix of Thomas Newcomb ...,
notes: "Tho. Cantuar, J. Sommers. C. Sunderland, Dorset, Romney, Orford."
"Given at the court at Whitehall the eighteenth day of October, 1697. In the ninth year of His Majesties reign."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
